trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a received security token is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 當接收到的安全性權杖無效時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> is typically thrown by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that contains values that are used during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含在序列化和還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間使用的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> that contains data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" />，包含有關序列化資料流之來源與目的端的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> class using the specified XML serialization data and contextual data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 序列化資料以及有關序列化資料流來源和目的端的內容資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> class using the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息來初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> class using the specified error message and root cause of the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和錯誤根本原因，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
